name: test_e2e_with_logs[526_XXE_ENCODE_003]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XXE_ENCODE_003` |
| **Name** | XXE Double-Encoded Exclamation ENTITY |
| **Category** | XXE |
| **Subcategory** | encoded_xxe |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/hosts">`
- **Encoded**: `%3C%21ENTITY%20xxe%20SYSTEM%20%22file%3A%2F%2F%2Fetc%2Fhosts%22%3E`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~56000ms
- **Timestamp**: 13:45:21.000 UTC

| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
